name: Exol Base.
description: My first map <3 I know it's quite far-fetched for a first map, but once I found out about Hexen scripting I couldn't resist! So be nice and pardon the dodgy scenery and wierd gameplay; I'm sure I'll get better. I have actually made some other maps but they were ages ago, made with Waded, and they sucked. So I would regard this as my first map.
